name: Erika H.
review: Stopped by here prior to coming into the office... The butter pecan cookie was one of the best I’ve ever had.

name: Ben B.
review: I love this shop! So many interesting and tasty items. Service is prompt and pleasant.

name: Jordan L.
review: This bakery may be small, but it's mighty. The blueberry pancake scones were the best I’ve ever had.

name: Whitney S.
review: Pint Size is one of my favorite bakeries in STL! Their oatmeal cookie sammie is my must-have item.

name: Kayla S.
review: If anything can drag me out of bed on a Saturday, it's their Salted Caramel Croissant!
